title: free garen skin
body: Verification code wont work for my account to get free garen skin from following on twitter.  Can anyone help me

replies.body: Are you sure it was for the right region? League of Legends with no region code means NA, not OCE.
It starts with NA so im guessing that north America, how do I get OCE code

Not 100% sure but I don't think it's available for OCE?

All I know is that you can get the Riot Girl Tristana by subscribing to the [OCE League of Legends Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesOceania).
